@1B [DD] #, ,RGYA GAR SKAD DU, [DD] PANYTZA BINGSHA TI SA HA SRI K'A

PRADZNY'A P'A RA MI T'A, BOD SKAD DU, SHES RAB KYI PHA ROL

TU PHYIN PA STONG PHRAG NYI SHU LNGA PA, DUM BU DANG PO,

BAM PO GCIG PA, SANGS RGYAS DANG BYANG CHUB [DD]


@2A [DD] #, ,SEMS DPA' THAMS CAD LA PHYAG 'TSAL LO, ,'DI SKAD BDAG

GIS THOS PA DUS GCIG NA, BCOM LDAN 'DAS RGYAL PO'I KHAB KYI RI
BYA RGOD PHUNG

PO LA; DGE SLONG LNGA STONG TZAM GYI DGE SLONG GI DGE 'DUN CHEN
PO DANG THABS GCIG STE, THAMS

CAD KYANG DGRA BCOM PA, ZAG PA ZAD PA, NYON MONGS PA MED PA,
DBANG DU GYUR PA, SEMS

SHIN TU RNAM PAR GROL BA, SHES RAB SHIN TU RNAM PAR GROL BA, CANG
SHES PA, GLANG [DD]


@2B PO CHEN PO, BYA BA BYAS PA, BYED PA BYAS PA, KHUR BOR BA,
RANG GI DON RAB TU THOB PA, SRID PAR KUN TU SBYOR BA YONGS

SU ZAD PA, BKA' YANG DAG PAS SEMS SHIN TU RNAM PAR GROL BA, SEMS
KYI DBANG THAMS CAD LA PHA ROL TU PHYIN

PA'I MCHOG THOB PA SHA STAG STE, GANG ZAG GCIG MA GTOGS PA NI,
'DI LTAR SLOB PA RGYUN DU ZHUGS PA TSE DANG LDAN PA

DGA' BO'O, ,DGE SLONG MA GRAGS 'DZIN DANG, SKYE DGU'I BDAG MO
CHEN MO LA SOGS PA LNGA BRGYA TZAM DANG, DGE BSNYEN DANG,

DGE BSNYEN MA SHIN TU MANG BA KUN KYANG CHOS MTHONG BA SHA STAG
DANG, BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' SEMS DPA' CHEN PO

TSAD MED GRANGS MED PA THAMS CAD KYANG GZUNGS RAB TU THOB PA,
TING NGE 'DZIN RAB TU THOB PA, STONG PA NYID KYIS RNAM


@3A *, ,PAR SPYOD PA, MTSAN MA MED PA'I SPYOD YUL CAN, RTOG PA
MED PA'I SMON LAM DANG LDAN PA, CHOS

THAMS CAD LA MNYAM PA NYID KYI BZOD PA RAB TU THOB PA, CHAGS PA
MED PA'I GZUNGS RAB TU THOB PA, THOGS PA MED PA'I

SPOBS PA DANG LDAN PA, BSTAN PA ZAD MI SHES PA LA SO SO YANG DAG
PAR RIG PA'I TSUL KHONG DU CHUD PA, MNGON PAR SHES

PA, MNYAN PAR 'OS PA'I TSIG DANG LDAN PA, LE LO

ZHUM PA MED PA, BDUD KYI LAS THAMS CAD LAS YANG DAG PAR 'DAS PA,
LAS KYI SGRIB PA RGYUN CHAD PA, LAS

DANG NYON MONGS PA DANG, PHYIR RGOL BA RAB TU BCOM PA, PHA ROL
PO'I RGOL BA THAMS CAD KYIS ZIL GYIS MI NON PA, NYAN THOS DANG
RANG SANGS RGYAS THAMS CAD KYIS RTOGS

PAR DKA' BA, CHOS RAB TU RTOGS PAS RNAM PAR DBYE ZHING BSTAN PA

PA, BZHIN 'DZUM PA DANG LDAN

PA LA MKHAS PA, SPOBS PA MI CHOD PA, 'KHOR

MTHA' YAS PA ZIL GYIS GNON PA'I MI 'JIGS PA DANG LDAN PA, BSKAL

PA, CHOS THAMS CAD SGYU MA

DANG, SMIG RGYU DANG, CHU ZLA DANG, RMI LAM DANG, SGRA BRNYAN

RGYUD DANG, SHES PA PHRA BA DANG, SPYOD PA DANG, MOS PA KHONG DU
CHUD PAR BYA BA LA MKHAS PA,


@4A *, ,SEMS CAN THAMS CAD LA SDANG BA MED PA'I SEMS DANG LDAN
PA, BZOD PA RLABS PO CHE DANG LDAN PA, CHOS THAMS CAD MNYAM PA
NYID DU RTOGS PAR BYA

BA'I YE SHES LA MKHAS PA, CHOS NYID ZAB MO DANG LDAN PAS GTING
DPAG DKA' BA, RANG GI SEMS LA DBANG RAB TU THOB PA, CHOS THAMS
CAD LA DBANG SHIN TU THOB PA, LAS

DANG NYON MONGS PA THAMS CAD SPANGS PA,

THAMS CAD SGRA BRNYAN DANG 'DRA BAR RTAG

SHING, LHAM ME, LHAN NE, LHANG NGER BZHUGS PA DE BZHIN DU, SHAR
PHYOGS KYI 'JIG RTEN GYI KHAMS GANGG'A'I


@9B KLUNG GI BYE MA SNYED ZIL GYIS MNAN TE 'OD DANG, SKU MDOG
DANG, GZI BRJID DANG, DPAL GYIS MDZES SHING, LHAM ME, LHAN NE,
LHANG NGER BZHUGS SO, ,DE BZHIN DU LHO DANG, NUB DANG, BYANG
DANG, BYANG

SHAR DANG, SHAR LHO DANG, LHO NUB DANG, NUB BYANG GI PHYOGS
MTSAMS DANG, 'OG DANG, STENG GI PHYOGS KYI PHYOGS RE RE ZHING
'JIG RTEN GYI KHAMS GANGG'A'I KLUNG GI BYE MA SNYED ZIL GYIS
MNAN TE,

'OD DANG, SKU MDOG DANG, GZI BRJID DANG, DPAL GYIS MDZES SHING,
LHAM ME, LHAN NE, LHANG NGER BZHUGS SO, ,'DI LTA STE, DPER NA,
RI'I RGYAL PO RI RAB RI NAG PO GZHAN THAMS CAD ZIL GYIS

NON PAR GNAS PA NI MDZES SHING, LHAM ME, LHAN NE, LHANG NGE'O,
,'DI LTA STE, DPER NA, ZLA BA'I DKYIL 'KHOR SKAR MA'I GZUGS THAMS
CAD ZIL GYIS NON PAR GNAS PA NI MDZES SHING LHAM ME,

LHAM NE, LHANG DE'O, ,'DI LTA STE, DPER NA, NYI MA'I DKYIL 'KHOR
'OD GZHAN THAMS CAD ZIL GYIS NON PAR GNAS PA NI MDZES SHING, LHAM
ME, LHAN NE, LHANG NGE'O, ,DE BZHIN DU BCOM LDAN 'DAS

PHYOGS BCU'I 'JIG RTEN LHA DANG BCAS PA, DBANG PO DANG BCAS PA,
TSANGS PA DANG BCAS PA, GTZANG MA'I GNAS DANG BCAS PA, ZIL GYIS
NON PAR BZHUGS PA YANG 'OD DANG, SKU MDOG DANG,

GZI BRJID DANG DPAL GYIS MDZES SHING, LHAM ME, LHAN NE, LHANG
NGE'O, ,DE NAS KYANG BCOM LDAN 'DAS KYIS STONG GSUM GYI STONG
CHEN PO'I 'JIG RTEN GYI KHAMS 'DIR, BCOM LDAN 'DAS


@10A *, ,KYIS RANG BZHIN GYI SKU CI 'DRA BA DE BZHIN DU BSTAN TO,
,DE NAS STONG GSUM GYI STONG CHEN PO'I 'JIG RTEN GYI KHAMS 'DI'I
GTZANG MA'I GNAS KYI LHA'I RIS DANG, KUN

SNANG DANG BA DANG, TSANGS RIS DANG, GZHAN 'PHRUL DBANG BYED
DANG, 'PHRUL DGA' DANG, DGA' LDAN DANG, MTSE MA DANG, SUM CU RTZA
GSUM DANG, RGYAL CHEN BZHI'I RIS KYI LHA GANG JI SNYED

PA DE THAMS CAD KYIS, DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA DGRA BCOM PA YANG DAG
PAR RDZOGS PA'I SANGS RGYAS GDAN SENGGE'I KHRI LA BZHUGS PA
MTHONG NAS, DGA' ZHING SPRO BA DANG, YID BDE ZHING

RAB TU DGA' LA NYAMS BDE BA DANG YID BDE BA SKYES NAS, LHA RDZAS
KYI ME TOG DANG, PHRENG BA DANG, SPOS DANG, BYUG PA DANG, PHYE MA
DANG, LHA RDZAS KYI BYUG SPOS DANG, LHA RDZAS KYI AUTPAL

DANG, PADMO DANG, KU MU DA DANG, PUndA RI KA DANG, NA LI NA DANG,
SOO GANDHI DANG, LHA RDZAS KYI ME TOG KE SA RA DANG, TA MA LA'I
LO MA DANG, LHA RDZAS KYI NA BZA' DANG, RGYAN DANG, GDUGS

DANG, RGYAL MTSAN DANG, LHA RDZAS KYI BA DAN MANG PO THOGS NAS,
BCOM LDAN 'DAS GANG NA BA DER SONG STE PHYIN NAS, ME TOG DANG,
PHRENG BA DANG, SPOS DANG, BYUG PA DANG, PHYE MA DANG,

BYUG SPOS DANG, AUTPA LA DANG, PADMO DANG, KU MU DA DANG, PUndA
RI KA DANG, NA LI NA DANG, SOO GANDHI DANG, ME TOG KE SA RA DANG,
TA MA LA'I LO MA DANG, LHA RDZAS KYI NA BZA' DANG, RGYAN


@10B DANG, GDUGS DANG, RGYAL MTSAN DANG, LHA'I BA DAN DAG GIS
BCOM LDAN 'DAS LA GTOR TO, ,MNGON PAR GTOR TO, ,MNGON PAR RAB TU
GTOR TO, ,STONG GSUM GYI STONG CHEN PO'I 'JIG RTEN

GYI KHAMS 'DI NA 'DUL BA DANG, SNOD DU GYUR PA'I MI JI SNYED CIG
YOD PA DE DAG KYANG ME TOG CHU LAS SKYES PA DANG, THANG LAS SKYES
PA MANG PO KHYER NAS, BCOM LDAN 'DAS GANG NA BA DER DONG STE

PHYIN NAS, BCOM LDAN 'DAS LA MCHOD PA BYED PAR GYUR TO, ,ME TOG
DANG, PHRENG BA DANG, SPOS DANG, BYUG PA DANG, PHYE MA LA SOGS PA
DANG, NA BZA' DANG, RGYAN DANG, GDUGS DANG, RGYAL

BAR GYUR TO, ,MNGON PAR 'PHYANG BAR GYUR TO, ,RAB TU 'PHYANG BAR
GYUR TO, ,ME TOG DANG, DAR GYI LDA LDI DE DAG GIS STONG GSUM GYI
STONG CHEN PO'I 'JIG RTEN GYI KHAMS 'DI SHIN TU

PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA 'DI NYID YANG DAG PAR

CES GSOL TO, ,BCOM LDAN 'DAS, BDAG KYANG 'JIG RTEN GYI KHAMS MI
MJED DER, BCOM LDAN 'DAS DE BZHIN GSHEGS

YOD PAR SPYOD CIG, DE CI'I PHYIR ZHE NA, 'JIG RTEN GYI KHAMS DER
SKYES PA'I BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' SEMS DPA'

CHEN PO DE DAG NI MGU BAR DKA' BA YIN GYI, DER NYAMS PAR GYUR TA
RE, DE NAS BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' SEMS DPA' CHEN PO MYA NGAN MED
PAS, BCOM LDAN 'DAS DE BZHIN GSHEGS

PA DGRA BCOM PA YANG DAG PAR RDZOGS PA'I SANGS RGYAS MYA NGAN MED
PA'I DPAL DE LAS, PADMO GSER GYI MDOG CAN 'DAB MA STONG DANG LDAN
PA DE DAG BLANGS TE, BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA'

KHYIM PA DANG, RAB TU BYUNG BA DANG, KHYE'U DANG BU MO'I GZUGS SU
'DUG PA BYE BA KHRAG KHRIG BRGYA STONG DU MA DANG 'GROGS TE,
SANGS RGYAS KYI ZHING DE NAS MI SNANG BAR GYUR NAS, LHO PHYOGS
KYI SANGS

RGYAS BCOM LDAN 'DAS GANG JI SNYED BZHUGS SHING 'TSO SKYONG BA DE
DAG THAMS CAD LA, ME TOG DANG, SPOS DANG, BDUG SPOS DANG, PHRENG
BA DANG, BYUG PA DANG, PHYE MA DANG, NA

BZA' DANG, RGYAN DANG, GDUGS DANG, RGYAL MTSAN DANG, BA DAN DAG
GIS RIM GROR BYA BA DANG, BKUR STIR BYA BA DANG, BSTI STANG DU
BYA BA DANG, MCHOD PA BYED CING BYANG CHUB


@16B SEMS DPA'I RDZU 'PHRUL CHEN PO DANG BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA'I
MTHU CHEN POS, BCOM LDAN 'DAS DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA DGRA BCOM PA
YANG DAG PAR RDZOGS PA'I SANGS RGYAS SH'AKYA THUB PA GANG NA

BA DER DONG STE PHYIN NAS, BCOM LDAN 'DAS KYI ZHABS GNYIS LA SPYI
BOS PHYAG BTZAL TE, PHYOGS GCIG TU 'KHOD DO, ,PHYOGS GCIG TU
'KHOD NAS BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' SEMS DPA'

CHEN PO MYA NGAN MED PAS, BCOM LDAN 'DAS LA 'DI SKAD CES GSOL TO,

RDZOGS PA'I SANGS RGYAS MYA NGAN MED

PA'I DPAL, BCOM LDAN 'DAS LA SNYUN MI MNGA'AM, GNOD PA MA MCHIS
SAM, ZO MDOG BDE'AM, SKU NYAMS DANG LDAN NAM, BDE BA DANG DGYES
PAR SPYOD DAM ZHES 'DRI STE, PADMO GSER

GYI MDOG CAN 'DAB MA STONG DANG LDAN PA 'DI DAG KYANG, BCOM LDAN
'DAS DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA MYA NGAN MED PA'I DPAL GYIS, BCOM LDAN
'DAS LA MCHOD PA'I SLAD DU BSKUR RO, ,DE NAS

BCOM LDAN 'DAS DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA SH'AKYA THUB PAS PADMO DE DAG
BZHES NAS, LHO PHYOGS KYI 'JIG RTEN GYI KHAMS GANGG'A'I KLUNG GI
BYE MA SNYED PO DE DAG GI SANGS RGYAS BCOM LDAN 'DAS

GANG NA BA DER GTOR TO, ,DE NAS PADMO DE DAG GIS 'JIG RTEN GYI
KHAMS DE DAG THAMS CAD RGYAS PAR KHYAB PAR GYUR TE, PADMO DE DAG
LA DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA'I SKU MANG PO BZHUGS SHING, 'DI LTAR PHA

DAG THAMS CAD KYANG BLA NA MED PA YANG DAG PAR

RDZOGS PA'I BYANG CHUB TU NGES PAR GYUR TO, ,BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA'
KHYIM PA DANG, RAB TU BYUNG BA DANG, KHYE'U DANG BU MO'I GZUGS SU
'DUG PA DE DAG GIS KYANG RANG RANG GI DGE BA'I RTZA BAS, BCOM

BYAS SO, ,BSTI STANG DU BYAS SO, ,MCHOD PA BYAS NAS PHYOGS

GANGG'A'I KLUNG GI BYE MA SNYED 'DAS PA KUN GYI PHA ROL NA, 'JIG
RTEN GYI KHAMS NYE BAR ZHI BA ZHES BYA BA YOD DE, DE NA DE BZHIN

CHEN 'OD 'PHRO ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SHING 'TSO SKYONG STE, DE BYANG

DPAL LA 'DI SKAD CES GSOL TO,,

PA'I SANGS RGYAS SH'AKYA THUB PA DE


@23A *, ,BLTA BA DANG, DE LA PHYAG BGYI ZHING BSNYEN BKUR BA
DANG, BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' SEMS DPA' CHEN PO DE DAG KUN KYANG
PHAL CHER GZHON NUR GYUR PA, GZUNGS

DANG, SO SO YANG DAG PAR RIG PA BSGRUB PA RAB TU THOB PA, TING
NGE 'DZIN DANG SNYOMS PAR 'JUG PA THAMS CAD LA DBANG RAB TU THOB
PA DE DAG BLTA BA'I SLAD DU MCHI'O, ,BCOM LDAN

'DAS TING NGE 'DZIN GYI GLANG PO DAM PA'I DPAL GYIS BKA' STZAL
PA, RIGS KYI BU, DE LTAR DE'I DUS LA BAB PAR SHES NA SONG ZHIG,
,,SHES RAB KYI PHA ROL TU

BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' RNAM PAR RGYAL BAS RNAM

PAR GNON PA LA, PADMO RIN PO CHE SNA TSOGS KYI RGYU LAS BYUNG BA,
GSER GYI MDOG CAN 'DAB MA STONG DANG LDAN PA STONG BSKUR TE, RIGS
KYI BU, BCOM LDAN 'DAS DE BZHIN GSHEGS

PA DGRA BCOM PA YANG DAG PAR RDZOGS PA'I SANGS RGYAS SH'AKYA THUB
PA DE LA, BCOM LDAN 'DAS SNYUN MI MNGA'AM, GNOD PA MA MCHIS SAM,
ZO MDOG BDE 'AM, SKU NYAMS DANG

LDAN NAM, BDE BA DANG DGYES PAR SPYOD DAM ZHES 'DRI STE, PADMO

LDAN 'DAS DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA TING NGE


@23B 'DZIN GYI GLANG PO DAM PA'I DPAL GYIS, BCOM LDAN 'DAS LA
MCHOD PA'I SLAD DU BSKUR RO ZHES KYANG GYIS LA, PADMO 'DI DAG GIS
GTOR CIG, RIGS KYI BU, SANGS RGYAS KYI ZHING DER BAG YOD

PAR SPYOD CIG, DE CI'I PHYIR ZHE NA, 'JIG RTEN GYI KHAMS DER
SKYES PA'I BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' SEMS DPA' CHEN PO DE DAG NI MGU
BAR DKA' BA YIN GYI, DER NYAMS PAR GYUR TA RE, DE NAS

BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' SEMS DPA' CHEN PO RNAM PAR RGYAL BAS RNAM
PAR GNON PAS, BCOM LDAN 'DAS DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA DGRA BCOM PA YANG
DAG PAR RDZOGS PA'I SANGS

RGYAS TING NGE 'DZIN GYI GLANG PO DAM PA'I DPAL DE LAS, PADMO
GSER GYI MDOG CAN 'DAB MA STONG DANG LDAN PA DE DAG BLANGS TE,
BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' KHYIM PA DANG, RAB TU BYUNG BA DANG, KHYE'U

DANG BU MO'I GZUGS SU 'DUG PA BYE BA KHRAG KHRIG BRGYA STONG DU
MA DANG 'GROGS TE, SANGS RGYAS KYI ZHING DE NAS MI SNANG BAR GYUR
NAS, BYANG SHAR GYI PHYOGS MTSAMS KYI SANGS RGYAS BCOM

CAD LA ME TOG DANG, SPOS DANG, BDUG SPOS DANG, PHRENG BA DANG,
BYUG PA DANG, PHYE MA DANG, NA BZA' DANG, RGYAN DANG,

BYED CING, BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA'I RDZU 'PHRUL CHEN PO

GYI KHAMS DE DAG THAMS CAD RGYAS PAR KHYAB PAR GYUR TE, PADMO DE

RGYAN

PA'I DPAL ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SHING 'TSO SKYONG STE,

GANGG'A'I KLUNG GI BYE MA SNYED PO DE DAG GI DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA
DGRA BCOM PA YANG DAG PAR RDZOGS PA'I SANGS

RGYAS DE DAG GANG NA BA DER GTOR TO, ,DE NAS PADMO DE DAG GIS
'JIG RTEN GYI KHAMS DE DAG THAMS CAD RGYAS PAR KHYAB PAR GYUR TE,
PADMO DE DAG LA DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA'I SKU MANG

PO BZHUGS SHING, 'DI LTAR PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA DRUG PO 'DI NYID
LAS BRTZAMS TE CHOS STON TO, ,CHOS BSTAN PA DE SEMS CAN GANG GIS
THOS PAR GYUR PA DE DAG THAMS CAD KYANG, BLA NA

MED PA YANG DAG PAR RDZOGS PA'I BYANG CHUB TU NGES PAR GYUR TO,
,BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' KHYIM PA DANG, RAB TU BYUNG BA DANG, KHYE'U
DANG BU MO'I GZUGS SU 'DUG PA DE DAG GIS KYANG


@30A *, ,RANG RANG GI DGE BA'I RTZA BAS, BCOM LDAN 'DAS DE BZHIN
GSHEGS PA DGRA BCOM PA YANG DAG PAR RDZOGS PA'I SANGS RGYAS
SH'AKYA THUB PA LA RIM GROR BYAS SO, ,

BKUR STIR BYAS SO, ,BSTI STANG DU BYAS SO, ,MCHOD PAR BYAS NAS
PHYOGS GCIG TU 'KHOD DE, DE NAS NUB BYANG GI PHYOGS MTSAMS SU
'JIG RTEN GYI KHAMS GANGG'A'I KLUNG GI BYE MA SNYED 'DAS PA KUN
GYI

PHA ROL NA, 'JIG RTEN GYI KHAMS DBANG DU GYUR PA ZHES BYA BA YOD
DE, DE NA DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA DGRA BCOM PA YANG DAG PAR RDZOGS
PA'I SANGS RGYAS GDUGS DAM PA ZHES BYA BA

BZHUGS SHING 'TSO SKYONG STE, DE BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' SEMS DPA'
CHEN PO RNAMS LA SHES RAB KYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA 'DI NYID YANG
DAG PAR STON PA MDZAD DO, ,DE NAS 'JIG RTEN

GYI KHAMS DE NA BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' SEMS DPA' CHEN PO RIN CHEN
MCHOG CES BYA BA 'DUG 'DUG PAS, SNANG BA CHEN PO DE DANG, SA CHER
G-YOS PA DE DANG, DE BZHIN GSHEGS

PA'I SKU BLTA NA CHOG MI SHES PA DE MTHONG NAS, BCOM LDAN 'DAS
GDUGS DAM PA GANG NA BA DER SONG STE PHYIN NAS, BCOM LDAN 'DAS DE
BZHIN GSHEGS PA DGRA BCOM PA YANG

DAG PAR RDZOGS PA'I SANGS RGYAS GDUGS DAM PA DE LA 'DI SKAD CES
GSOL TO, ,BCOM LDAN 'DAS, 'OD CHEN PO 'DI LTA BU 'JIG RTEN DU
BYUNG BA DANG, DOG SA 'DI LTAR CHER


@30B G-YOS PA DANG, DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA'I SKU 'DI LTA BU GDA' BA
'DI CI'I RGYU, CI'I RKYEN, DE SKAD CES GSOL PA DANG, BCOM LDAN
'DAS DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA GDUGS DAM PAS, BYANG CHUB

SEMS DPA' SEMS DPA' CHEN PO RIN CHEN MCHOG LA 'DI SKAD CES BKA'
STZAL TO, ,RIGS KYI BU, 'DI NAS SHAR LHO'I PHYOGS MTSAMS LOGS
SU 'JIG RTEN GYI KHAMS GANGG'A'I KLUNG GI BYE MA

SNYED 'DAS PA NA, 'JIG RTEN GYI KHAMS MI MJED CES BYA BA YOD DE,
DE NA DE BZHIN GSHEGS BA DGRA BCOM PA YANG DAG PAR RDZOGS PA'I
SANGS RGYAS SH'AKYA THUB PA ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS

SHING 'TSO SKYONG NGO, ,DE BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' SEMS DPA' CHEN PO
RNAMS LA SHES RAB KYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA STON TE, 'DI NI DE'I
MTHU YIN TE, DE 'DRA'O, ,DE NAS BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA'

SEMS DPA' CHEN PO RIN CHEN MCHOG GIS, BCOM LDAN 'DAS DE BZHIN
GSHEGS PA GDUGS DAM PA LA 'DI SKAD CES GSOL TO, ,BCOM LDAN 'DAS,
BDAG KYANG 'JIG RTEN

GYI KHAMS MI MJED DER, BCOM LDAN 'DAS DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA DGRA
BCOM PA YANG DAG PAR RDZOGS PA'I SANGS RGYAS SH'AKYA THUB PA DE
BLTA BA DANG, DE LA PHYAG BGYI ZHING BSNYEN

BKUR BA DANG, BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' SEMS DPA' CHEN PO DE DAG KUN
KYANG PHAL CHER GZHON NUR GYUR PA, GZUNGS DANG SO SO YANG DAG PAR
RIG PA BSGRUB PA RAB TU THOB PA, TING


@31A *, ,NGE 'DZIN DANG SNYOMS PAR 'JUG PA THAMS CAD LA DBANG RAB
TU THOB PA DE DAG BLTA BA'I SLAD DU MCHI'O, ,BCOM LDAN 'DAS DE
BZHIN GSHEGS PA GDUGS

DAM PAS BKA' STZAL PA, RIGS KYI BU, DE LTAR DE'I DUS LA BAB PAR
SHES NA SONG ZHIG, DE NAS DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA DGRA BCOM PA YANG
DAG PAR RDZOGS PA'I SANGS RGYAS GDUGS

DAM PAS, BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' SEMS DPA' CHEN PO RIN CHEN MCHOG
LA, PADMO RIN PO CHE SNA TSOGS KYI RGYU LAS BYUNG BA, GSER GYI
MDOG CAN 'DAB MA STONG DANG LDAN PA STONG BSKUR

TE; RIGS KYI BU, BCOM LDAN 'DAS DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA DGRA BCOM PA
YANG DAG PAR RDZOGS PA'I SANGS RGYAS SH'AKYA THUB PA DE LA, BCOM
LDAN 'DAS SNYUN MI MNGA' MA, GNOD

PA MA MCHIS SAM, ZO MDOG BDE 'AM, SKU NYAMS DANG LDAN NAM, BDE BA
DANG DGYES PAR SPYOD DAM ZHES 'DRI STE, PADMO GSER GYI MDOG CAN
'DAB MA STONG DANG LDAN PA 'DI DAG KYANG,

BCOM LDAN 'DAS DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA GDUGS DAM PAS, BCOM LDAN 'DAS
LA MCHOD PA'I SLAD DU BSKUR RO ZHES KYANG GYIS LA, PADMO 'DI DAG
GIS GTOR CIG, RIGS KYI BU,

SANGS RGYAS KYI ZHING DER BAG YOD PAR SPYOD CIG, DE CI'I PHYIR
ZHE NA, 'JIG RTEN GYI KHAMS DER SKYES PA'I BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA'
SEMS DPA' CHEN PO DE DAG NI MGU BAR DKA' BA


@31B YIN GYI, DER NYAMS PAR GYUR TA RE, DE NAS BYANG CHUB SEMS
DPA' SEMS DPA' CHEN PO RIN CHEN MCHOG GIS, BCOM LDAN 'DAS DE
BZHIN GSHEGS PA DGRA BCOM PA YANG DAG PAR

RDZOGS PA'I SANGS RGYAS GDUGS DAM PA DE LAS, PADMO GSER GYI MDOG
CAN 'DAB MA STONG DANG LDAN PA DE DAG BLANGS TE, BYANG CHUB SEMS
DPA' KHYIM PA DANG, RAB TU BYUNG BA DANG, KHYE'U

DANG BU MO'I GZUGS SU 'DUG PA BYE BA KHRAG KHRIG BRGYA STONG DU
MA DANG 'GROGS TE, SANGS RGYAS KYI ZHING DE NAS MI SNANG BAR GYUR
NAS, NUB BYANG GI PHYOGS MTSAMS KYI SANGS RGYAS BCOM

LDAN 'DAS GANG JI SNYED CIG BZHUGS SHING 'TSO SKYONG BA DE DAG
THAMS CAD LA ME TOG DANG, SPOS DANG, BDUG SPOS DANG, PHRENG BA
DANG, BYUG PA DANG, PHYE MA DANG, NA BZA' DANG, RGYAN

DANG, GDUGS DANG, RGYAL MTSAN DANG, BA DAN DAG GIS RIM GROR BYA
BA DANG, BKUR STIR BYA BA DANG, BSTI STANG DU BYA BA DANG, MCHOD
PA BYED CING, BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA'I RDZU 'PHRUL CHEN

PO DANG BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA'I MTHU CHEN POS, BCOM LDAN 'DAS DE
BZHIN GSHEGS PA DGRA BCOM PA YANG DAG PAR RDZOGS PA'I SANGS RGYAS
SH'AKYA THUB PA GANG NA BA DER DONG STE PHYIN

NAS; BCOM LDAN 'DAS KYI ZHABS GNYIS LA SPYI BOS PHYAG BTZAL TE
PHYOGS GCIG TU 'KHOD DO, ,PHYOGS GCIG TU 'KHOD NAS, BYANG CHUB
SEMS DPA' SEMS DPA' CHEN PO

YANG RUNG STE,

LDOG PA'I SA 'THOB PA'ANG YOD DO, ,SH'A RADVA TI'I BU, 'DI LTAR
YANG BYANG

CHUB SEMS DPA' SEMS DPA' CHEN PO DANG PO SEMS BSKYED PA NYID
KYIS, BLA NA MED PA YANG DAG PAR RDZOGS PA'I BYANG CHUB TU MNGON
PAR 'TSANG RGYA ZHING, MNGON PAR SANGS RGYAS NAS CHOS KYI

'KHOR LO BSKOR TE, SEMS CAN TSAD MED GRANGS MED PA'I DON BYAS
NAS, PHUNG PO MA LUS PA'I MYA NGAN LAS 'DAS PA'I DBYINGS SU YONGS
SU MYA NGAN LAS 'DA' ZHING, DE DAG YONGS SU MYA NGAN LAS

'DAS NAS KYANG, DAM PA'I CHOS BSKAL PA'AM, BSKAL PA BAS LHAG PAR
GNAS PA DAG KYANG YOD DO, ,SH'A RADVA TI'I BU, 'DI LTAR YANG
BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' SEMS DPA' CHEN PO DANG PO SEMS

BSKYED PA NYID KYIS, SHES RAB KYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA'I RNAL
'BYOR LA SNYOMS PAR 'JUG CING, DE DAG BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' BYE BA
KHRAG KHRIG BRGYA STONG DU MA DANG LHAN CIG SANGS RGYAS KYI ZHING

BLTA BA DANG, SEMS CAN YONGS SU SMIN PAR BYA BA DANG, SANGS RGYAS
KYI ZHING YONGS SU DAG PAR BYA BA'I DON DU 'DONG BA DAG

KYANG YOD DO, ,SH'A RADVA TI'I BU, BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' SEMS DPA'

BZOD PA'I PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA'I GO CHA'O, ,TSE DANG LDAN PA SH'A

RADVA TI'I BU, GZHAN YANG BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' SEMS DPA' CHEN PO

YIN GYI, RNAM PA THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA NYID DANG LDAN PA'I

PA 'DOR BA

GNAS PA ZHES BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN GANG ZHE NA, TING NGE 'DZIN


@321B DE LA GNAS SHING, TING NGE 'DZIN THAMS CAD LA RAB TU GNAS
PAR 'GYUR BA STE, 'DI NI RAB TU GNAS PA ZHES BYA BA'I TING NGE
'DZIN TO, ,DE LA RIN CHEN MTHA' ZHES BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN GANG
ZHE NA, TING NGE

'DZIN DE LA GNAS SHING, TING NGE 'DZIN THAMS CAD RIN CHEN MTHA'
LTAR KUN NAS SNANG BA STE, 'DI NI RIN CHEN MTHA' ZHES BYA BA'I
TING NGE 'DZIN TO, ,DE LA CHOS DAM PA'I PHYAG RGYA ZHES BYA BA'I
TING NGE 'DZIN

GANG ZHE NA, TING NGE 'DZIN DE LA GNAS SHING, TING NGE 'DZIN
THAMS CAD PHYAG RGYA MED PA'I MTHAS PHYAG RGYAS BTAB PAR NYE BAR
BZUNG BAS PHYAG RGYAS BTAB PAR 'GYUR BA STE, 'DI NI CHOS DAM PA'I
PHYAG

RGYA ZHES BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN TO, ,DE LA CHOS THAMS CAD MNYAM
PA NYID CES BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN GANG ZHE NA, TING NGE 'DZIN
DE LA GNAS SHING, CHOS GANG YANG MNYAM PA NYID DU MA CHUD PA MED
PAR YANG

DAG PAR RJES SU MTHONG BA STE, 'DI NI CHOS THAMS CAD MNYAM PA
NYID CES BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN TO, ,DE LA DGA' BA SPONG BA ZHES
BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN GANG ZHE NA, TING NGE 'DZIN DE LA GNAS
SHING, TING NGE 'DZIN

THAMS CAD DANG CHOS THAMS CAD KYI DGA' BA SPONG BA STE, 'DI NI
DGA' BA SPONG BA ZHES BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN TO, ,DE LA CHOS
KYIS 'PHAGS PA ZHES BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN GANG ZHE NA, TING NGE
'DZIN DE LA

GNAS SHING, CHOS THAMS CAD KYI MUN PA SEL BA DANG, TING NGE 'DZIN
THAMS CAD KYIS MNGON PAR 'PHAGS PAR 'GYUR BA STE, 'DI NI CHOS
KYIS 'PHAGS PA ZHES BYA BA'I TING NGE 'DZIN TO, ,DE LA RNAM PAR

MA YIN LA BDEN PA YANG DAG PA STE, JI LTA BA BZHIN DU RTAG CING
BRTAN LA, THER ZUG MI 'GYUR BA'I CHOS CAN GYI DNGOS PO ZHIG YIN
NA NI, THEG PA CHEN PO 'DIS KYANG LHA DANG, MI DANG, LHA MA YIN
DU

PA'I DUS DMIGS PA LTA CI ZHIG SMOS, MA 'ONGS PA'I DUS DANG, DA
LTAR BYUNG BA'I DUS DMIGS PA LTA CI ZHIG SMOS,


@435A *, ,RAB 'BYOR, GZHAN YANG SO SO'I SKYE BO NI SNGON GYI
MTHAR MI DMIGS, SO SO'I SKYE BO NI PHYI MA'I MTHAR MI DMIGS, SO
SO'I SKYE BO NI DA LTAR BYUNG BAR MI

DMIGS, SO SO'I SKYE BO NI DUS GSUM MNYAM PA NYID LA MI DMIGS TE,
DE CI'I PHYIR ZHE NA, SEMS CAN DMIGS SU MED PA'I PHYIR RO, ,RAB
'BYOR, GZHAN YANG NYAN THOS NI SNGON GYI MTHAR

MI DMIGS, NYAN THOS NI PHYI MA'I MTHAR MI DMIGS, NYAN THOS NI DA
LTAR BYUNG BAR MI DMIGS, NYAN THOS NI DUS GSUM MNYAM PA NYID LA
MI DMIGS TE, DE CI'I PHYIR ZHE NA,

SANGS RGYAS NI SNGON GYI MTHAR MI DMIGS, RANG SANGS RGYAS NI PHYI
MA'I MTHAR MI DMIGS, RANG SANGS

MNYAM PA NYID LA MI DMIGS TE, DE CI'I PHYIR ZHE NA, SEMS CAN
DMIGS SU MED PA'I PHYIR RO, ,RAB 'BYOR,

GZHAN YANG BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' NI SNGON GYI MTHAR MI DMIGS,
BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' NI PHYI MA'I MTHAR MI DMIGS, BYANG CHUB SEMS
DPA' NI DA LTAR BYUNG BAR MI DMIGS,

SU MED DE GNYIS SU BYAR MED DO, ,TSE DANG LDAN PA SH'A RADVA TI'I
BU, NANG STONG PA NYID MED PA'I PHYIR, BYANG CHUB SEMS

DPA' SNGON GYI MTHAR MI DMIGS SO, ,DNGOS PO MED PA'I NGO BO NYID
STONG PA NYID KYI BAR DU MED PA'I PHYIR, BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA'
SNGON GYI MTHAR MI DMIGS SO, ,NANG STONG PA NYID STONG

PA NYID KYI PHYIR, BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' SNGON GYI MTHAR MI DMIGS
SO, ,DNGOS PO MED PA'I NGO BO NYID STONG PA NYID KYI BAR DU STONG
PA NYID KYI PHYIR, BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' SNGON GYI MTHAR

MI DMIGS SO, ,NANG STONG PA NYID DBEN PA'I PHYIR, BYANG CHUB SEMS
DPA' SNGON GYI MTHAR MI DMIGS SO, ,DNGOS PO MED PA'I NGO BO NYID
STONG PA NYID KYI BAR DU DBEN PA'I PHYIR, BYANG

CHUB SEMS DPA' SNGON GYI MTHAR MI DMIGS SO, ,NANG STONG PA NYID
NGO BO NYID MED PA'I PHYIR, BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' SNGON GYI MTHAR
MI DMIGS SO, ,DNGOS PO MED PA'I NGO BO NYID

STONG PA NYID KYI BAR DU NGO BO NYID MED PA'I PHYIR, BYANG CHUB
SEMS DPA' SNGON GYI MTHAR MI DMIGS SO, ,NANG STONG PA NYID MED
PA'I PHYIR, BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' PHYI MA'I MTHAR MI DMIGS

BAR DU MED PA'I PHYIR, BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' PHYI MA'I MTHAR MI
DMIGS SO, ,NANG STONG PA NYID STONG PA NYID

KYI PHYIR, BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' PHYI MA'I MTHAR MI DMIGS SO,
,DNGOS PO MED PA'I NGO BO NYID STONG PA NYID KYI BAR DU STONG PA
NYID KYI PHYIR, BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' PHYI MA'I MTHAR MI

STONG PA NYID KYI BAR DU DBEN PA'I PHYIR, BYANG CHUB

NYID MED PA'I PHYIR, BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' PHYI MA'I MTHAR MI
DMIGS SO, ,DNGOS PO MED PA'I NGO BO NYID STONG

PHYIR, BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' DBUS SU MI DMIGS

PA NYID STONG PA NYID KYI PHYIR, BYANG CHUB

@449B NYID DBEN PA'I PHYIR, BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' DBUS SU MI DMIGS
SO, ,DNGOS PO MED PA'I NGO BO NYID STONG PA NYID KYI BAR DU DBEN
PA'I PHYIR, BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' DBUS SU MI DMIGS

SO; ;NANG STONG PA NYID NGO BO NYID MED PA'I PHYIR, BYANG CHUB
SEMS DPA' DBUS SU MI DMIGS SO, ,DNGOS PO MED PA'I NGO BO NYID
STONG PA NYID KYI BAR DU NGO BO NYID MED PA'I PHYIR, BYANG CHUB

SEMS DPA' DBUS SU MI DMIGS SO, ,DE CI'I PHYIR ZHE NA, TSE DANG
LDAN PA SH'A RADVA TI'I BU, NANG STONG PA NYID DANG, DNGOS PO MED
PA'I NGO BO NYID STONG PA NYID KYI BAR DU MED PA DANG, STONG PA

NYID DANG, DBEN PA DANG, NGO BO NYID MED PA LA SNGON GYI MTHA' MI
DMIGS, PHYI MA'I MTHA' MI DMIGS, DBUS MI DMIGS TE, NANG STONG PA
NYID DANG, DNGOS PO MED PA'I NGO BO NYID

STONG PA NYID KYI BAR DU MED PA DANG, STONG PA NYID DANG, DBEN PA
DANG, NGO BO NYID MED PA'ANG GZHAN MA YIN, BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA'
YANG GZHAN MA YIN, SNGON GYI MTHA' YANG GZHAN MA YIN,

PHYI MA'I MTHA' YANG GZHAN MA YIN, DBUS KYANG GZHAN MA YIN NO,
,TSE DANG LDAN PA SH'A RADVA TI'I BU, DE LTAR NA NANG STONG PA
NYID DANG, DNGOS PO MED PA'I NGO BO NYID STONG PA NYID KYI BAR DU

MED PA DANG, STONG PA NYID DANG, DBEN PA DANG, NGO BO NYID MED PA
GANG YIN PA DANG, BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' GANG YIN PA DANG, SNGON
GYI MTHA' GANG YIN PA DANG, PHYI MA'I MTHA' GANG

RADVA TI'I BU, DRAN PA NYE BAR BZHAG PA

MED PA'I PHYIR, BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' SNGON GYI MTHAR MI DMIGS SO,
,YANG DAG PAR SPONG BA DANG, RDZU 'PHRUL GYI RKANG PA DANG, DBANG
PO DANG, STOBS DANG, BYANG CHUB KYI YAN LAG

THAR PA DANG, MTHAR GYIS GNAS

SNGON GYI MTHAR MI DMIGS SO, ,DRAN PA

STE, DRAN PA NYE BAR BZHAG PA RNAMS ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI GLO BUR

DU MING DU BTAGS PA STE, MING LA'ANG DRAN PA NYE BAR BZHAG PA
RNAMS MED, DRAN PA NYE BAR BZHAG PA RNAMS LA'ANG MING MED DO, ,DE
CI'I PHYIR ZHE NA, 'DI LTAR MING GANG YIN PA DANG,

DRAN PA NYE BAR BZHAG PA RNAMS GANG YIN PA DE GNYIS KA'ANG MED
CING MI DMIGS STE, DE'I PHYIR 'DI LTA STE, BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA'
ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI MING TZAM MO, ,TSE DANG LDAN PA

SH'A RADVA TI'I BU, 'DI LTA STE, YANG DAG PAR SPONG BA RNAMS
DANG, RDZU 'PHRUL GYI RKANG PA RNAMS DANG, DBANG PO RNAMS DANG,
STOBS RNAMS DANG, BYANG CHUB KYI YAN LAG RNAMS DANG, 'PHAGS

PA'I LAM YAN LAG BRGYAD PA ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI GLO BUR DU MING DU
BTAGS PA STE, MING LA'ANG 'PHAGS PA'I LAM YAN LAG BRGYAD PA MED,
'PHAGS PA'I LAM YAN LAG BRGYAD PA

DE GNYIS KA'ANG MED CING MI DMIGS TE, DE'I PHYIR 'DI LTA STE,

BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI MING TZAM MO, ,TSE DANG
LDAN PA SH'A RADVA TI'I BU, 'DI LTA STE, 'PHAGS PA'I BDEN PA

PA'I SGO STONG PA NYID DANG, MTSAN MA MED PA

DANG, SMON PA MED PA DANG, MNGON PAR SHES PA RNAMS DANG, TING NGE
'DZIN RNAMS DANG, GZUNGS KYI SGO RNAMS DANG, DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA'I
STOBS BCU DANG, MI 'JIGS PA BZHI DANG,

SHES PA DANG MA SKYES PA DE GNYIS SU MA MCHIS TE, GNYIS SU BGYIR
MA MCHIS SO, ,DE CI'I SLAD

DU ZHE NA, BCOM LDAN 'DAS, DE NI 'DI LTAR MA SKYES PA NI GCIG MA
LAGS, GNYIS MA LAGS, MANG BA MA LAGS, THA DAD PA MA LAGS TE, DE'I
SLAD DU RNAM PAR SHES PA'I MA SKYES

PA GANG LAGS PA DE RNAM PAR SHES PA MA LAGS SO, ,BCOM LDAN 'DAS,
MIG GI MA SKYES PA GANG LAGS PA DE MIG MA LAGS TE, DE LTAR NA MIG
DANG MA SKYES PA DE GNYIS SU MA

MCHIS TE, GNYIS SU BGYIR MA MCHIS SO, ,DE CI'I SLAD DU ZHE NA,
BCOM LDAN 'DAS, DE NI 'DI LTAR MA SKYES PA NI GCIG MA LAGS, GNYIS
MA LAGS, MANG BA MA LAGS, THA DAD PA MA

LAGS TE, DE'I SLAD DU MIG GI MA SKYES PA GANG LAGS PA DE MIG MA
LAGS SO, ,BCOM LDAN 'DAS, RNA BA DANG, SNA DANG, LCE DANG, LUS
DANG, YID KYI MA SKYES PA GANG LAGS PA DE YID MA LAGS

TE; DE LTAR NA YID DANG MA SKYES PA DE GNYIS SU MA MCHIS TE,
GNYIS SU BGYIR MA MCHIS SO, ,DE CI'I SLAD DU ZHE NA, BCOM LDAN
'DAS, DE NI 'DI LTAR MA SKYES PA NI GCIG MA LAGS,

GNYIS MA LAGS, MANG BA MA LAGS, THA DAD PA MA LAGS TE, DE'I SLAD
DU YID KYI MA SKYES PA GANG LAGS PA DE YID MA LAGS SO, ,BCOM LDAN
'DAS, GZUGS KYI MA SKYES


@489B PA GANG LAGS PA DE GZUGS MA LAGS TE, DE LTAR NA GZUGS DANG
MA SKYES PA DE GNYIS SU MA MCHIS TE, GNYIS SU BGYIR MA MCHIS SO,
,DE CI'I SLAD DU ZHE NA, BCOM LDAN 'DAS,

DE NI 'DI LTAR MA SKYES PA NI GCIG MA LAGS, GNYIS MA LAGS, MANG
BA MA LAGS, THA DAD PA MA LAGS TE, DE'I SLAD DU GZUGS KYI MA
SKYES PA GANG LAGS PA DE GZUGS MA LAGS

KYI MA SKYES PA GANG LAGS PA DE, CHOS MA LAGS TE DE LTAR NA CHOS
DANG MA SKYES PA DE GNYIS SU MA MCHIS TE, GNYIS

SU BGYIR MA MCHIS SO, ,DE CI'I SLAD DU ZHE NA, BCOM LDAN 'DAS, DE
NI 'DI LTAR MA SKYES PA NI GCIG MA LAGS, GNYIS MA LAGS, MANG BA
MA LAGS, THA DAD PA MA LAGS TE, DE'I

SLAD DU CHOS KYI MA SKYES PA GANG LAGS PA DE CHOS MA LAGS SO,
,BCOM LDAN 'DAS, MIG GI RNAM PAR SHES PA'I MA SKYES PA GANG LAGS
PA DE MIG GI RNAM PAR SHES PA MA LAGS TE, DE LTAR

NA MIG GI RNAM PAR SHES PA DANG, MA SKYES PA DE GNYIS SU MA MCHIS

LDAN 'DAS, DE NI 'DI LTAR MA SKYES PA NI GCIG MA LAGS,

MA LAGS, THA DAD PA MA LAGS TE, DE'I SLAD DU YID KYI 'DUS TE REG

TU PHYIN PA LA SPYOD PA'I TSE, CHOS 'DI DAG LA YONGS

SU RTOG PA MED PA'I TSUL GYIS DE LTAR YONGS SU RTOG GO ,SMRAS PA,
TSE DANG LDAN PA RAB 'BYOR, CI'I PHYIR NA DE SKAD DU, GZUGS KYI
MA SKYES PA GANG YIN PA DE NI GZUGS MA YIN,

TSOR BA DANG, 'DU SHES DANG, 'DU BYED DANG, RNAM PAR SHES PA'I MA
SKYES PA GANG YIN PA DE NI RNAM PAR SHES PA MA YIN ZHES ZER, TSE
DANG LDAN PA RAB 'BYOR, CI'I PHYIR NA, DE SKAD

DU SKYE MCHED DANG, KHAMS DANG, RTEN CING 'BREL PAR 'BYUNG BA
DANG, PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA RNAMS DANG, STONG PA NYID THAMS CAD
DANG, BYANG CHUB KYI PHYOGS KYI CHOS THAMS CAD DANG,

'PHAGS PA'I BDEN PA RNAMS DANG, BSAM GTAN RNAMS DANG, TSAD MED PA
RNAMS DANG, GZUGS MED PA'I SNYOMS PAR 'JUG PA RNAMS DANG, RNAM
PAR THAR PA RNAMS DANG,

DANG, MNGON PAR SHES PA RNAMS DANG,

STONG PA STE, DE NI NANG NA'ANG MI GNAS, PHYI ROL NA'ANG MI

GNAS, GNYIS KA MED PAR YANG MI DMIGS SO, ,TSE DANG LDAN PA SH'A
RADVA TI'I BU, MIG GI 'DUS TE REG PA'I RKYEN GYIS TSOR BA NI RANG
BZHIN GYIS STONG PA STE, DE NI NANG NA'ANG MI GNAS,

PHYI ROL NA'ANG MI GNAS, GNYIS KA MED PAR YANG MI DMIGS SO, ,TSE
DANG LDAN PA SH'A RADVA TI'I BU, RNA BA'I 'DUS TE REG PA'I RKYEN
GYIS TSOR BA DANG, SNA'I 'DUS TE REG PA'I RKYEN GYIS

TSOR BA DANG, LCE'I 'DUS TE REG PA'I RKYEN GYIS TSOR BA DANG, LUS
KYI 'DUS TE REG PA'I RKYEN GYIS TSOR BA DANG, YID KYI 'DUS TE REG
PA'I RKYAN GYIS TSOR BA NI RANG BZHIN GYIS STONG PA STE,

BYA'O, ,DE CI'I PHYIR 'JIG RTEN PA'I SHES RAB KYI PHA ROL TU
PHYIN PA ZHES BYA ZHE NA, DE NI 'DI LTAR 'JIG RTEN LAS MI G-YO

MI 'PHAGS MI 'DA' BAS, DE'I PHYIR 'JIG RTEN PA ZHES BYA'O, ,DE LA
'JIG RTEN LAS 'DAS PA'I SHES RAB KYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA GANG ZHE
NA, 'DI LTAR 'KHOR GSUM YONGS SU DAG PA

STE; DE LA 'KHOR GSUM YONGS SU DAG PA GANG ZHE NA, TSE DANG LDAN
PA SH'A RADVA TI'I BU, 'DI LA BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' SEMS DPA' CHEN
PO SHES RAB KYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA BSGOM

BA'I 'BRAS BU MNGON DU BYA BA'I PHYIR ZHUGS PA'O, ,PHYIR MI 'ONG
BA STE, DE NYID DU YONGS SU MYA NGAN LAS 'DA' BA'O, ,DGRA BCOM

PA'I 'BRAS BU MNGON DU BYA BA'I PHYIR ZHUGS PA'O, ,DGRA BCOM PA
STE, TSE 'DI NYID LA PHUNG PO MA LUS PA'I MYA NGAN LAS 'DAS PA'I
DBYINGS SU MYA NGAN LAS 'DA' PA'O, ,RANG SANGS RGYAS SO ZHES

BYA BAR DMIGS PA'I TSUL GYIS GNAS PAR MI BYA'O, ,NYAN THOS KYIS
DANG, RANG SANGS RGYAS KYI SA LAS 'DAS TE BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA'I
SA LA GNAS PAR BYA'O, ,LAM GYI RNAM PA SHES PA NYID KYI

YE SHES DANG, RNAM PA THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA NYID KYI YE SHES LA
GNAS PAR BYA'O ZHES BYA BAR DMIGS PA'I TSUL GYIS GNAS PAR MI
BYA'O, ,RNAM PA THAMS CAD DU CHOS THAMS CAD MNGON PAR RDZOGS


@556A *, ,PAR SANGS RGYAS NAS, BAG CHAGS KYI MTSAMS SBYOR BA'I
NYON MONGS PA THAMS CAD ZAD PAR BYA'O, ,BLA NA MED PA YANG DAG
PAR RDZOGS PAR SANGS RGYAS NAS CHOS KYI

'KHOR LO BSKOR PAR BYA'O, ,SANGS RGYAS KYI BYA BA BYAS TE, 'JIG
RTEN GYI KHAMS TSAD MED GRANGS MED PAR SONG STE, SEMS CAN RNAMS
YONGS SU MYA NGAN LAS 'DA'O ZHES BYA BAR DMIGS PA'I

TSUL GYIS GNAS PAR MI BYA'O, ,RDZU 'PHRUL GYI RKANG PA BZHI LA
GNAS TE TING NGE 'DZIN GANG LA SNYOMS PAR ZHUGS PAS, BSKAL PA
GANGG'A'I KLUNG GI BYE MA SNYED DU GNAS PAR 'GYUR BA DE LTA BU'I

TING NGE 'DZIN LA MNYAM PAR BZHAG GO ZHES BYA BAR DMIGS PA'I TSUL
GYIS GNAS PAR MI BYA'O, ,BDAG GI CHE NE TSAD MED PAR GYUR CIG CES
BYA BAR DMIGS PA'I TSUL GYIS GNAS PAR

MI BYA'O, ,BDAG GIS SKYES BU CHEN PO'I MCHAN SUM CU RTZA GNYIS
LAS MTSAN RE RE ZHING YANG, BSOD NAMS BRGYAS YONGS SU GRUB PAR
GYUR CIG CES BYA BAR DMIGS PA'I TSUL GYIS GNAS

BAR MI BYA'O, ,SHAR PHYOGS KYI 'JIG RTEN GYI KHAMS GANGG'A'I
KLUNG GI BYE MA SNYED LA RGYA JI TZAM YOD PA DANG, LHO DANG, NUB
DANG, BYANG DANG, BYANG SHAR DANG, SHAR LHO DANG, LHO NUB DANG,
NUB BYANG

GI 'JIG RTEN GYI KHAMS GANGG'A'I KLUNG GI BYE MA SNYED LA RGYA
JI TZAM YOD PA DE TZAM GYI THA GRUR BDAG GIS SANGS RGYAS KYI
ZHING GCIG BSGRUB BO ZHES BYA BAR DMIGS PA'I TSUL GYIS GNAS


@556B BAR MI BYA'O, ,BDAG GIS STONG GSUM GYI STONG CHEN PO'I 'JIG
RTEN GYI KHAMS RDO RJE'I RGYU LAS GRUB PAR GYUR CIG CES BYA BAR
DMIGS PA'I TSUL GYIS GNAS PAR MI BYA'O, ,BDAG GIS BYANG

CHUB KYI SHING GI DRI SEMS CAN GANG GIS TSOR YANG RUNG STE, DE
DAG LA 'DOD CHAGS DANG, ZHE SDANG DANG, GTI MUG GI GNOD PA MED
PAR GYUR CIG ,NYAN THOS KYI SEMS DANG, RANG SANGS RGYAS

KYI SEMS BSKYED PAR MA GYUR CIG CES BYA BAR DMIGS PA'I TSUL GYIS
GNAS PAR MI BYA'O, ,DE DAG THAMS CAD KYANG BLA NA MED PA YANG DAG
PAR RDZOGS PA'I BYANG CHUB TU NGES PAR GYUR CIG ,

CES BYA BA DANG, SEMS CAN GANG GIS BYANG CHUB KYI SHING GI DRI DE
TSOR BAR GYUR PA DE DAG GI LUS SAM, SEMS LA NANG GANG YANG MED
PAR GYUR CIG CES BYA BAR DMIGS PA'I TSUL GYIS GNAS

PAR MI BYA'O, ,BDAG GIS SANGS RGYAS KYI ZHING DER GZUGS KYI SGRA
YOD PAR MA GYUR CIG CES BYA BAR DMIGS PA'I TSUL GYIS GNAS PAR MI
BYA'O, ,TSOR BA DANG, 'DU SHES DANG, 'DU BYED DANG,

RNAM PAR SHES PA'I SGRA YOD PAR MA GYUR CIG CES BYA BAR DMIGS
PA'I TSUL GYIS GNAS PAR MI BYA'O, ,KHAMS DANG, SKYE MCHED DANG,
RTEN CING 'BREL BAR 'BYUNG BA'I SGRA YOD PAR MA

GYUR CIG CES BYA BAR DMIGS PA'I TSUL GYIS GNAS PAR MI BYA'O,
,SBYIN PA'I PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA'I SGRA YOD PAR MA GYUR CIG ,TSUL
KHRIMS KYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA DANG, BZOD PA'I PHA


@557A *, ,ROL TU PHYIN PA DANG, BRTZON 'GRUS KYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN
PA DANG, BSAM GTAN GYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA DANG, SHES RAB KYI PHA
ROL TU PHYIN PA'I SGRA YOD PAR MA GYUR

CIG ,NANG STONG PA NYID KYI SGRA YOD PAR MA GYUR CIG ,PHYI STONG
PA NYID KYI SGRA YOD PAR MA GYUR CIG ,PHYI NANG STONG PA NYID KYI
SGRA YOD PAR MA GYUR CIG ,DNGOS PO MED PA'I NGO BO NYID STONG PA
NYID KYI BAR GYI

SGRA YOD PAR MA GYUR CIG CES BYA BAR DMIGS PA'I TSUL GYIS GNAS
PAR MI BYA'O, ,DRAN PA NYE BAR BZHAG PA RNAMS KYI SGRA YOD PAR MA
GYUR CIG ,YANG DAG PAR SPONG BA DANG, RDZU 'PHRUL GYI RKANG

PA DANG, DBANG PO DANG, STOBS DANG, BYANG CHUB KYI YAN LAG DANG,
'PHAGS PA'I LAM YAN LAG BRGYAD PA'I SGRA YOD PAR MA GYUR CIG
,'PHAGS PA'I BDEN PA RNAMS DANG, BSAM

GTAN RNAMS DANG, TSAD MED PA RNAMS DANG, GZUGS MED PA'I SNYOMS
PAR 'JUG PA RNAMS DANG, RNAM PAR THAR PA RNAMS DANG, MTHAR GYIS
GNAS PA'I SNYOMS PAR 'JUG PA RNAMS

DANG; RNAM PAR THAR PA'I SGO STONG PA NYID DANG, MTSAN MA MED PA
DANG, SMON PA MED PA DANG, MNGON PAR SHES PA DANG, TING NGE 'DZIN
DANG, GZUNGS KYI SGO DANG, DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA'I

STOBS DANG, MI 'JIGS PA DANG, SO SO YANG DAG PAR RIG PA DANG,
BYAMS PA CHEN PO DANG, SNYING RJE CHEN PO DANG, SANGS RGYAS KYI
CHOS MA 'DRES PA RNAMS KYI SGRA YOD PAR MA GYUR CIG


@557B CES BYA BAR DMIGS PA'I TSUL GYIS GNAS PAR MI BYA'O,
,RGYUN DU ZHUGS PA'I SGRA YOD PAR MA GYUR CIG ,LAN GCIG PHYIR
'ONG BA'I SGRA DANG, PHYIR MI 'ONG BA'I SGRA DANG, DGRA BCOM PA'I
SGRA

YOD PAR MA GYUR CIG CES BYA BAR DMIGS PA'I TSUL GYIS GNAS PAR MI
BYA'O, ,RANG SANGS RGYAS KYI SGRA YOD PAR MA GYUR CIG ,BYANG CHUB
SEMS DPA'I SGRA YOD PAR MA GYUR CIG ,SANGS

RGYAS KYI SGRA YOD PAR MA GYUR CIG CES BYA BAR DMIGS PA'I TSUL
GYIS GNAS PAR MI BYA'O, ,DE CI'I PHYIR ZHE NA, 'DI LTAR DE BZHIN
GSHEGS PA DGRA BCOM PA YANG DAG PAR RDZOGS

PA'I SANGS RGYAS KYIS, BLA NA MED PA YANG DAG PAR RDZOGS PA'I
BYANG CHUB TU MNGON PAR RDZOGS PAR SANGS RGYAS KYANG CHOS THAMS
CAD MI DMIGS PA'I PHYIR TE, KOO SHI KA, DE LTAR BYANG CHUB

SEMS DPA' SEMS DPA' CHEN POS SHES RAB KYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA LA
DMIGS PA'I TSUL GYIS GNAS PAR MI BYA'O, ,DE NAS TSE DANG LDAN PA
SH'A RADVA TI'I BU 'DI SNYAM STE, JI LTAR BYANG CHUB

SEMS DPA' SEMS DPA' CHEN POS SHES RAB KYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA LA
GNAS PAR BYA SNYAM PA DANG, DE NAS TSE DANG LDAN PA RAB 'BYOR
GYIS, TSE DANG LDAN PA SH'A RADVA TI'I BU'I SEMS KYI RNAM

PAR RTOG PA SEMS KYIS YONGS SU SHES NAS, TSE DANG LDAN PA SH'A
RADVA TI'I BU LA SMRAS PA, TSE DANG LDAN PA SH'A RADVA TI'I BU,
DE JI SNYAM DU SEMS, DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA DGRA BCOM PA YANG DAG


@558A *, ,PAR RDZOGS PA'I SANGS RGYAS CI ZHIG LA GNAS, SMRAS PA,
TSE DANG LDAN PA RAB 'BYOR, DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA NI CI LA'ANG GNAS
PA MA YIN NO, ,TSE DANG

LDAN PA RAB 'BYOR, DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA DGRA BCOM PA YANG DAG PAR
RDZOGS PA'I SANGS RGYAS KYI THUGS NI, SBYIN PA'I PHA ROL TU PHYIN
PA LA MI GNAS, TSUL KHRIMS KYI PHA ROL TU

PHYIN PA DANG, BZOD PA'I PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA DANG, BRTZON 'GRUS
KYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA DANG, BSAM GTAN GYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA
DANG, SHES RAB KYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA LA MI GNAS

SO; ;DE GZUGS LA MI GNAS SO, ,TSOR BA DANG, 'DU SHES DANG, 'DU
BYED DANG, RNAM PAR SHES PA LA MI GNAS SO, ,SKYE MCHED DANG,
KHAMS DANG, RTEN CING 'BREL PAR

'BYUNG BA LA MI GNAS, NANG STONG PA NYID LA MI GNAS, PHYI STONG
PA NYID LA MI GNAS, PHYI NANG STONG PA NYID LA MI GNAS, DNGOS PO
MED PA'I NGO BO NYID STONG PA NYID KYI BAR LA MI
